synopsis.text: Takahashi and Shioyama, the masterminds behind beloved animes like Armored Trooper VOTOMs and Panzer World Galient, present a thrilling saga of magic and might! Set on the timeless planet of Mozaika, the once compassionate King Sazara has succumbed to the manipulation of a malevolent priest, embarking on a ruthless quest for power and domination. Amidst this chaos, Mozaika's salvation lies in the hands of U-Taruma, the valiant young warrior and son of U-Dante, a loyal knight who fell victim to Sazara's tyranny. U-Taruma must now navigate a perilous journey, rallying an army of ancient battle robots, rescuing the captivating Princess Menoza, and restoring peace to his war-torn world. This captivating 4-episode OVA is a must-watch for fantasy enthusiasts and fans of Shioyama's iconic character designs!
